confidence_rationale: Strong methodological support that computational claims require reproducible, inspectable artifacts; this aligns with MECH-900 trajectory-integrity evidence discipline but is indirect to REE-specific mechanisms.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Computational science findings are strengthened when analyses and artifacts are reproducible and auditable.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports MECH-900 emphasis that trajectory-integrity outputs should be validated with traceable artifacts and consistent replayable conditions.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Methodological rather than mechanistic neuroscience evidence; supports process integrity, not claim-specific neural dynamics.
mapping.source_context: Computational research methods and evidence quality standards.

confidence_components.notes: High-quality source for reproducibility standards with moderate transfer distance to REE mechanism-level claims.
